mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.id, r.code, r.name, r.description, r.level, r.status, r.is_deleted, r.version, r.create_time, r.update_time, r.create_by, r.update_by FROM role r INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND r.status = 1 AND ur.is_deleted = 0 AND ur.status = 1 ORDER BY r.id
